document.discussion_title: SAA: Nothing irregular about Hong Kong's financial statements request
document.topic_text: Disclaimers SAA: Nothing irregular about Hong Kong's financial statements request South African Airways (SAA) says there is nothing irregular about a request from Hong Kong for the carrier to submit regulatory documents. NATIONAL NEWS - South African Airways (SAA) says there is nothing irregular about a request from Hong Kong for the carrier to submit regulatory documents.Sunday Times is reporting that the national carrier has been given until early next month to submit its annual financial statement or face deregistration.If SAA fails to meet the deadline set by the Hong Kong registrar of companies on 6 September, it has threatened to ground all flights to that country. The airline had requested a R5 billion bailout which Finance Minister Pravin Gordhan declined. 09:52 (GMT+2), Mon, 22 August 2016 Your Comments... Login or Register here. *To REGISTER you will be directed to the registration page. Once you have completed the registration process, please return to this page. Weather
